secondaries.shortDescription: At the end of the battle round, score 2 victory points for each CHARACTER, MONSTER or VEHICLE model destroyed that battle round by a melee attack made by a TRAITORIS ASTARTES CHARACTER model from your army. If such a destroyed model had a Wounds characteristic of 10-19, score 1 additional victory point for destroying that model, or 2 additional victory points for destroying that model if it had a Wounds characteristic of 20 or more or it was the enemy WARLORD.

subObjectives.description: Killed CHARACTER, MONSTER OR VEHICLE in MELEE ATTACK by a TRAITORIS ASTARTES CHARACTER
You killed a CHARACTER, MONSTER or VEHICLE. Roll 2D6. If it's less than the wounds of the model, gain 1 CP
The model had Wounds of 20+ OR is the WARLORD

secondaries.shortDescription: Score 1 for each enemy unit in range of an objective marker at the start of that turn destroyed by a HERETIC ASTARTES, score 2 if you control 1+ objective that were controlled by your opponent at the start of the turn.

subObjectives.description: Killed 1 ennemy unit within range of an objective marker at the start of that turned with a HERETIC ASTARTES unit
Control 1+ objective that were controlled by your opponent at the start of that turn with a HERETIC ASTARTES fully within the range of the objective

secondaries.shortDescription: Add 1 to the tally every time a unit dedicated a table quarter to a Chaos God.

subObjectives.description: You dedicated 1 quarter to the chaos gods
You dedicated 2 quarter to the chaos gods
You dedicated 3 quarter to the chaos gods
You dedicated 4 quarter to the chaos gods
